How Much Whole Grain is Enough?
Experts recommend eating six serving of grain per day, at leat three of which are whole grain.
1 cup oatmeal 2 servings of whole grain
A sandwich 2 servings of whole grain

1 whole wheat English muffin 2 servings whole grain
3 cups popcorn 1 serving of whole grain
1 cup 50% whole grain pasta 1 servings of whole grain
1 cup whole grain cereal 1 servings of whole grain
½ round whole wheat pita 1 servings of whole grain
1 cup cooked quinoa 2 servings of whole grain
